name: Lernerfolg Vorschule: Capt'n Sharky
overview: Even little pirates have to go to school at some point! Luckily Captain Sharky helps with the preparation. In this game, the player learns how to deal with letters and numbers, trains his memory, practices dealing with money and plays small logic games. As a reward for successful learning, the player unlocks more and more levels and bonus games. Features: Playfully prepare for elementary school with Captain Sharky No reading skills required, as the game uses continuous voice output Children learn their first letters and numbers Memory and logical thinking are trained For all preschoolers from 4 years Based on the award-winning PC edutainment series Captain Sharky voice actors: Dirk Bach (German) and Fatih Çevikkollu (Turkish)
